## IsNever type

If T is never, return true, else return false.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type IsNever<T> = IsExtends<T, never>
```
**References:** [IsExtends](./types-kit.isextends.md)

## Example


```ts
// Expect: true
type Foo = IsNever<never>
```
